main event: A bright intense flash of light followed by a series of colored lights observed in Roswell, New Mexico on August 11, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes, The lights included both stationary and flashing colors, No shape or size was identified in the report, The report concluded that the sighting was characteristic of a meteor, Sparks observed were yellow to orange in color.
sighted object: series of colored lights in the sky
witness description: Chiet-weather, no specific witness details provided
